Title: Beyoncé: Lemonade
Director: Beyoncé, Kahlil Joseph, Dikayl Rimmasch, Todd Tourso, Jonas Åkerlund, Melina Matsoukas, Mark Romanek
Actors: Beyoncé, Brittani Alexander, Jasmine Badie, Fulani Bahati
Plot: A view of a woman's journey through life.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 5 wins & 6 nominations.
